column1: NGR is from 1950s record and is near Rhayader at the correct altitude. Cannot locate Pen Valley, but the name might be Penralley and there is a Penralley House but this is 400m S and 50 ft. lower.

The readings from July 1931 to Dec 1934 have been adjusted but the workings are not attached and an unclear note suggests they are adjusted for altitude. The original or amended readings do not compare well with East Street, 300m away, therefore the readings have been removed.
